view

Class CardTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CardTheme

  • public class CardTheme
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a card theme.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardTheme()
      Constructs an empty CardTheme object.
      CardTheme(java.lang.String themeFile, java.lang.String backFacePath)
      Constructs a CardTheme object with the specified json file and image file as back face.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFrontFace(java.lang.String key, javafx.scene.image.Image value)
      Adds an Image object to the theme with the specified key.
      javafx.scene.image.Image getBackFace()
      Returns the Image object that holds the back face of the theme.
      javafx.scene.image.Image getFrontFace(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the Image object that holds the front face for the specific id.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javafx.scene.image.Image> getImages()
      Returns the Map that holds the Image objects of the theme.
      java.lang.String getThemeFile()
      Returns the path to the theme file.
      void parseTheme()
      Parses the json file and creates the Image objects.
      void removeFrontFace(java.lang.String key)
      Removes an Image object from the theme with the specified key.
      void setBackFace(javafx.scene.image.Image backFace)
      Sets the Image object that holds the back face of the theme.
      void setThemeFile(java.lang.String themeFile)
      Sets the path for the theme file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardTheme

        public CardTheme(java.lang.String themeFile,
                 java.lang.String backFacePath)
        Constructs a CardTheme object with the specified json file and image file as back face.
        Parameters:
        themeFile - Path to the theme json file.
        backFacePath - Path to the back face image file.

      • CardTheme

        public CardTheme()
        Constructs an empty CardTheme object. You need to set the theme file and back face Image, and call the parseTheme() method before using.

    • Method Detail

        Sets the path for the theme file.
        Parameters:
        themeFile - The path for the theme file to be set.

        Sets the Image object that holds the back face of the theme.
        Parameters:
        backFace - The Image object to be set.

      • getFrontFace

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getFrontFace(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the Image object that holds the front face for the specific id.
        Parameters:
        key - The id of the card.
        Returns:
        The Image object that holds the front face of the card.

      • addFrontFace

        public void addFrontFace(java.lang.String key,
                         javafx.scene.image.Image value)
        Adds an Image object to the theme with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - The id as a key.
        value - The Image object for the key.

      • removeFrontFace

        public void removeFrontFace(java.lang.String key)
        Removes an Image object from the theme with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - The id of the Image object to be removed.

        Returns:

      • parseTheme

        Parses the json file and creates the Image objects.
